metadata.dc:author: Castiñeiras Fernández, J
Cabello Torres, P
Sánchez del Pino, M J
López Múñoz, A
metadata.dc:description: We submit the present paper three cases of prostate abscess. The various aspects related to ethiopathogeny, clinic, and current diagnostic procedures are analyzed emphasixing the use of endocavitary echography, as well as the different therapeutic approaches that can be used, with particular attention to ecomonitored aspirative drainage.
metadata.dc:title: Absceso de próstata: ecografía endocavitaria y drenaje ecodirigído.
[Abscess of the prostate: intracavitary echography and echo-guided drainage].
